thumbQuerySQL: select count(*) as count from thumb where article_id='<%= article_id %>'
thumbFlagSQL: select count(*) as count from thumb where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and article_id='<%= article_id %>'
thumbSQL: insert into thumb (user_id, article_id) values('<%= user_id %>','<%= article_id %>')
thumbCancelSQL: delete from thumb where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and article_id='<%= article_id %>'
